items.sentence: I can't believe that you aren't planning on doing that.
I've already told Tom he won't be permitted to do that.
Every mosquito species makes a slightly different buzz.
Tom said that he wished that he didn't have to do that.
They left right at five, so they should be home by six.
I'm now fairly certain that that isn't going to happen.
Tom got caught speeding but was let off with a warning.
Tom lapsed into a coma and didn't regain consciousness.
Tom was teased at school because he was a slow learner.
Tom was overwhelmed by the amount of work he had to do.
